text.section: This section does not apply if its application would disqualify the State or a county from receiving federal money.

section.section:
The Board of County Commissioners shall:
adopt policies, regulations, or amendments that are necessary to implement:
review and approve each housing project that the Queen Anne's Authority proposes before the housing project is started; and
establish maximum income limits for persons of eligible income.
For special housing projects, the Board of County Commissioners may establish exceptions to the maximum income limits for persons of eligible income.
